title: The Gift of Rain - visiting home of grandfather

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eng uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex feelings the narrator experiences upon visiting his mother’s childhood home, where his grandfather still resides.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eng uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex feelings the narrator experiences upon visiting his mother’s childhood home, where his grandfather still resides.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
